name: Bird Bash
description:
Bird Bash is a competitive game for 2-4 players where you need to collect a lot of Golden Nuts!

You can't collect them just by touching them though, because they are a little bit... bumpy!

🪃 Throw your boomerang-tail to hook them and collect them...

...But be careful! 😱 Your boomerang-tail is also your shield! 🛡️

Your opponents can steal your golden nuts if they attack you while you don't wear your tail!





Keyboard controls (only for 2 players):

You can play with keyboard but controllers are strongly recommended!

Player 1: WASD + T (Jump) + Y (Throw tail)
Player 2: arrow keys + O (Jump) + P (throw tail)

The game has been tested with PS4/Xbox controllers.
